Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: CMHARLEY
Reviews.Content: My family had reservations on March 07, 2012. I have never seen such a disgusting motel in my life as this one!!! The first room we were given. The door looked like it was kicked a few times. My grandson who is six said to me mom-mom, there is mold in the bath tub. I know if we stayed there we could not even take out shoes off and walk on the carpet! We complained and was transfered to another room which was not much better!! There needs to be a major face lift the this hotel if we would ever consider staying there!!! We went to another hotel needless to say....................I think no one should stay at this hotel and it should be shut down!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great bday week at Motel Blu”
Reviews.Author: Mercedes W
Reviews.Content: Went to Miami last min trip for my 23rd birthday with no hotel book or anything planned searched an searched for hotels an motels only to find rediculous prices for its worth. Ran across Motel BLU number an called awaiting for them to tell me a crazy price for a motel they did the opposite the owner, Chris asked me how long of my stay an price range he gave me a great deal an worked his magic. Invited us to take a look around an we were sold. pros: spacious room an walkin shower great pool SELF CONTROLLED AC 15- 20 min away from South Beach with an without traffic helpful and accommodating staff great night life surrounding con: breakfast mostly just dounuts an coffee little things " someone out there would love it " its better than a regular motel jus its not a 5star hotel over all great stay great service, THANKS AGAIN CHRIS

Reviews.Title: “Don't Waste Your Money”
Reviews.Author: traveller1353
Reviews.Content: the worst Motel I've ever seen in my life.......... Bathroom ceiling was leaking Dirty room sheets were stained DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Room”
Reviews.Author: HRK2012XYZ
Reviews.Content: Great price for an ok room. This room was a little dated but it did have some modern features. You get a great location for a even better price. The room was clean and no problems with it at all. Beds were comfortable and firm.

Reviews.Title: “Be Afraid, Be Very Afraid !!!!”
Reviews.Author: Don M
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival to the Motel Blu we found it to be in an unsafe area with music blasting through the courtyard, trash throughout the grounds, cigarettes still burning on the stairways, mucus dripping from the hand rails and an individual sitting outside his rooms smoking marijuana. Once given the key card to our room, we found it was occupied by another guest. The second room we were given was equipped with a single bed and a tattered comforter laced with cigarette burns, rather than the 2 Full Beds as per our agreement. The third room wreaked of Orange Oder Eliminator and had only 1 functioning light switch. The fourth and final room offered was missing the screens to the windows that did not lock and had exposed bulbs & wiring that was clearly not within the limits of any safety codes.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible motel”
Reviews.Author: rojicha07
Reviews.Content: The negative reviews in this site are TRUE! TRUST THEM! Stay away of this motel unless you are only planning to use it for sleeping while been busy around Miami ALL DAY LONG. The rooms are very dirty, nasty and smell bad. Service is TERRIBLE. There's no TV Cable and no working Wi-Fi. Beds are horrible, carpet is scary, towels feel dirty, etc etc. The surroundings of this motel sucks too... very creepy, ugly and dangerous. Please find somewhere else to spend the night. You will regret staying in this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Not as Advertised!”
Reviews.Author: jessica f
Reviews.Content: This motel is not as advertised! They advertise "ocean view" and the only view is the canal across the street. Room was clean, however, maid service was not provided daily and when they came they would just hang dirty towels back on the rack or take them and not provide clean towels. There was a huge crack in door to outside, windows did not have room darkening privacy drapes as advertised in ammenities, rather sheers that did not fit properly. There was no room decor, no phone in room, and when I tried to call the desk from my cell phone on multiple occassions, no one answered the phone. The cable had been out for a while and there was no cable tv at all during my 5 day stay. The speaker by the pool blasted loud music well past 10 PM. Also, there was no hot water for two days. Motel was located next to a strip club and in a shady part of town. Also was within a ten minute drive of the beach, as opposed to a five minute walk as alluded to. Overall, it was a poor stay but because I had paid up front, there were no refunds so felt I had no alternative. Would not recommend staying here, especially with a family such as I had done, did not feel safe at all. Only saw security guard on last evening of stay.

Reviews.Title: “Will be back”
Reviews.Author: malware l
Reviews.Content: We looked at a few other hotels in Miami before we chose this one, and we were happy with our choice. Rooms: Clean, spacious, and nicely decorated. The furniture in our room was new, and they cleaned the romos everyday. Location: Bus stops are outsiede fo motel that take you to the beach, and downtown. I felt safe walking to the restaurants around the area at night. Staff: Friendly, and helpful. The housekeeprs were nice, and cleaned my room everyday, and the desk staff was friendly and allowed me to use their phone. Great value for the money. They give you free breakfast, and parking which saved us some money, which was great. I would reccommend this to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: philip s
Reviews.Content: Went down to Miami for a few days on holiday, and found this place for a great price. The rate came with a free breakfast which was nothing more than bagels, donuts, cookies, and coffee, but it was good for a quick start for the day. The room we had was room 118 it was very nice, with microwave and fridge. I didnt see any bugs or anything and it was cleaned everyday by the time we came back from touring. The pool was very nice, and I used it everyday on our 4 day stay. The staff was very helpful, and helped us out alot. The motel was full for some art fair in town, and we met alot of people from all over the world. The motel has bus stops across the street which take you to the beach, and downtown which took us about 10-15 minutes. This place is great for the price, clean room, great service, nice pool, and free parking and wi-fi which was a bonus. It has a restaurant on the property, but we didnt eat there...this is a solid 3 star motel at a 2 star price, great value!!! I reccomend this for tourists, couples, friends, and solo travelers, not so much for business people.

Reviews.Title: “Reservation was canceled without letting me know!”
Reviews.Author: p p
Reviews.Content: My reservation I did couple of weeks upfront was canceled without letting me know! I found it just after I arrived to Miami aiport from Europe. I got no message regarding this. No apology, no effort to help. I will not recommend anybody to use this motel. Luckily a very nice hotel nearby downtown was recommended to us at the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Great for touring bands...”
Reviews.Author: gustavo f
Reviews.Content: Great motel and helpful staff. We'd come back to Motel Blu in a heartbeat. As a traveling reggae band our budgets are tight and this motel made the Miami stay that much better. We'll be back soon...

Reviews.Title: “Warning!”
Reviews.Author: GlobeTraveler22
Reviews.Content: Stayed Nov 4-11. Cockroaches in room 104 & 103! They don't give refunds and we had paid online without knowing so had to stay or lose the money! Maid service was lousy. They only changed the sheets and cleaned after 5 days because we complained! Window did not lock, a security risk. Hot water ran out quickly. Continental breakfast was only coffee & very few doughnuts that ran out quickly. They entered our room while we were out and left our dog in the room even though we put the Do Not Disturb sign up. Only positive part was the parking guy and the restaurant right next door. I didn't expect a lot, but I certainly didn't expect it to be this aweful!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Jay L
Reviews.Content: Im not sure what everyone is complaining about.....awesome rate, great service, and clean rooms.....if you want 5 star than pay the 5 star price...this was a really good place for a great value. Free breakfast, pool, free parking, friendly staff, and clean rooms. The motel was full, they have thousands of guests....they have to be doing something rite!

Reviews.Title: “The worst motel ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sarahgs_11
Reviews.Content: I made reserations before our cruise. The lobby was dirty and smelled. We went to our room and it was terrible. The curtains were only half covering the window. We turned the loud air conditioner on. When I went to use the bathroom there was black mold every where. I am very allergic to mold. I asked for a different room. The next room was not cleaned. The bed were not made and the pillows were laying on the filthy dirty floor. I was given another room and it was just as bad as the first, even worst because the air conditioner did not work. It had to be over a hundred in the room. I did not ask for another room. I did ask for a phone book to call another hotel and they could not find one. I have never left a motel before and am always looking for deal. I would not stay at this motel, even if it was free. We paid for two nights and received no refund. We ended up staying at the New Yorker and would definitly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE!!!”
Reviews.Author: Karen L
Reviews.Content: This motel was HORRIBLE. I dare not touch anything in the room for fear of catching something. It was seedy, look like the place of employment for "women of the night" and their questionable clients. It oloks nothing like they advertise. Do not take your family there! We checked out as soon as we saw the unacceptable accommodations.

Reviews.Title: “in the past it was nicer”
Reviews.Author: Kathy S
Reviews.Content: we have stayed at this place numerous times and while a few of the staff and I have become very close I am disappointed to say this past experienced ruined our view of the motel. Lets start by the car parked on the sidewalk right outside my parents room. When asked to move it as it was heat sensored alarm we were told we cant expect them to turn off there car alarm. Keep in mind every single person staying in this hotel walked by all day and all night and it kept my parents up. Next my parents paid for a room with a refrig and microwave didnt get it and when asked for the difference in price we were told we had to collect from hotel. com. My parents room 105 was so disquisting even a employee stated oh I cant believe they stuck you in that room. there are no towel bars at all, the tub has a giant crack along wall which bugs were going in and out of. There was no working lamp and tv clicker and my parents had to wait over 5 hours to get it. There room smelled soooo bad it was almost unbearable. Numerous times during the trip my mom had to go get towels as her room was not cleaned one day and was told the stuff is in the dryer that she would have to wait. Her blinds in her room were so torn they didnt even block ally way that was by there room. We are very basic simple people but go to Walmart and buy towel racks, blinds take some bleach to the air conditioner and take care of the bugs... they could make this a decent room with alittle tlc but the way they handled it was not so good. I am very disappointed in this stay and my mom and dad were very upset with the situation. When asked why they were not getting the room they paid for with the refrig and microwave they said they were sold out but a room with its shade propped was empty three out of the four days with that stuff in it was right next door. Also they advertise continental breakfast it is donuts and coffee with no napkins even. I understand it is a low rate but the room we stayed in while cleaner had no fire alarm and smelled like mold. The air in our room was not working and they said because the blinds dont block the sun well then fix them. We took the cover off the air conditioner and there was so much mold and you could stick your hand out the hole to the outside. This is not okay. My husband had two asthma attacks from the mold which he has not experienced in years. I thought they were coming along with fixing up the place but it seems to be at a stall. Like I said if your going to charge someone for refrig and microwave make sure they have one and the bugs ughhhhhhhhhh they were all over!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Motel for staying a view day's”
Reviews.Author: AshwinMathoera
Reviews.Content: During our vacation we visit Motel Blu and stayed here for more than 1 week, This motel is a nice place to stay and the people who are working here are just like a family. We had nice service and the manager Chris was very flexible during the financial aspects. This motel has a good location and grocery shops or Chinese food are nearby. If we would visit Miami again we would curtain visit Motel Blue again. greeting, Ashwin & Astrid

Reviews.Title: “"I will never come back to this"”
Reviews.Author: rhurd2070
Reviews.Content: This i a vary poor place to stay, the picture that show's must be when they first opened the motel , the curtains where falling off the wall, the bathroom window wouldn't close, the air condition seem to be coming from the wall. You could not walk on the floor without shoes because you might have caught something and the donuts were hard and old and the coffee creamer was stuck to the can. Vary unhappy with this place and would never visit again.

Reviews.Title: “So much potential going to waste”
Reviews.Author: mrsmole58
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 2 nights prior to a cruise from Port of Miami. The hotel has so much potential but it is wasted. Had an efficiency! yes we had a microwave and 'fridge' but that was it, no coffee maker, cups, spoons, plates etc. no plugs in the sinks my husband foud it very difficult having a shave. There was no hair dryer even. No washing facilities, have stayed in some scuzzy hotels but even these provided a means to wash and dry clothes. toiletries consisted of a bar of soap. The pool is much smaller than it looks in he photos and very tired looking with very few of those lovely loungers left round the pool. The lyrical waxing about the wonderful lobby area on the web site is pure fantasy. The area arounnd the Motel does not feel safe after dark and it is located next door to a strip club with associated ladies wandering about. On the plus side the room was clean and comfortable and th internet worked well. The girls behind the reception desk were excelent and very helpful helping us to contact the previous hotel we had stayed in when we found we had left something important behind. I would not stay here again it is only suitable really for groups of young men who would feel safe and not need to dry their hair and need the fridge for their beers.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting motel!!!! should be banned!!”
Reviews.Author: priya v
Reviews.Content: Donot go by the pics!! Me and my hubby had been to Miami and without reading reviews booked this motel ..whoever reading this review please don't think of booking this motel even if its on a very good deal.. I was shoched when It is overpriced,its so stinky,its filthy, its rotten ,its slum for a place like Miami.. seriously the sheets were stained all over and the carpets was as if they got it from garbage ..it was too old,wet all over and we could see so many drosophila flying around..no wonder the bathroom was in a bad condition too..the broken tiles ,filthy shower curtain, no towels!! the table lamps were as if they got it for charity..old broken .. I was scared to even sit on the bed as seeing all this made me sick and I got allergy..rashes. we went to the front desk to vacate out and they had a board saying no refunds and so finally I asked atleast for a room change and she refused it. then I said the room is so dirty and I'm getting rashes all over me .. She then changed the room it was no better only thing the sheets looked a little tidy. we both managed to spend time in Miami beach until it was midnight and came back just to get few hours of sleep. we left early in the morning and wished never to come back.

Reviews.Title: “Good price, close to everything”
Reviews.Author: JDnt
Reviews.Content: You definitively get what you pay for. I have stayed a couple of times in the motel blu with no regrets. Very friendly staff and helpful. Nice, cheap motel to stay for a weekend in Miami. Clean room. I cant complain, the price can not beat right in the Biscayne.

Reviews.Title: “Fit all my needs”
Reviews.Author: dakmarya
Reviews.Content: I live in Miami, and was having my kitchen remodeled, and needed a place to stay with my family. Chose motel blu because of the price, and proximity to my house. It fit all of my needs, clean, free wi-fi, a pool, and safe. My kids and wife enjoyed playing in and around the pool, and I didn't feel scared leaving them there by themselves. Rooms were cleaned everyday, and the housekeepers were nice. The people at the desk were helpful, and didn't mind faxing things for me, and allowed me to use their phone. I was there with my fam for 3 days, and had no complaints. Great price, great service, and over all great experience.

Reviews.Title: “the hovel”
Reviews.Author: binx079
Reviews.Content: disgusting, smelly, rip off motel. Think they've gone on photoshop or something and doctored the pictures, making it look lovely. Never saw any cleaner with a mop or a cloth, don't think they know how to use one. Pubic hairs in bathroom sink, just a completely upsetting experience. Put me off from Miami for life. Didn't know the area, just gone by what it said on the website, and picked the motel from the pictures that were displayed. Hotel wasn't the cheapest prices, we have lovely travel lodges for less than that in the UK, and they're very clean. So why couldn't this one be clean atleast? Air conditioning didn't work. DO NOT PUT YOUR HEALTH IN DANGER BY VISITING THIS PLACE. Funny how there was no refunds, we know why now. Staff was unhelpful, continental breakfast was in reception, next to a vending machine, no where to sit, no tables, soggy cake, chocolate oreos. Didn't know that was breakfast here. Would label the coffee to probably be the taste of old urine.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...”
Reviews.Author: garaba2
Reviews.Content: Personnel was very friendly and was a good value at $50 incl taxes. Was clean enough, but not spotless. Very Bad breakfast and a lot of movement and prostitution in the surrounding. However, we didn't have any trouble.

Reviews.Title: “Feels like a 'classic' with modern ammenities”
Reviews.Author: DeucesWild2
Reviews.Content: Nice, clean, comfortable & cheerfull. Located between the quiet north beaches(Haulover ) & SB (we're big fans of the Deuce Club). We tend to avoid the over-the-top side of Miami, our days usually run... cuban coffee, beach, quirky restaurant, & dive-bars. There was secure parking for our rental car. I think our room was recently renovated. It was comfortably sized, had a kitchenette w/ an extra sink, microwave, mini fridge/freezer (great for snacks, leftovers, bevs, etc). The pool was just outside our door, and it could be a bit noisy if a loud group with kids were using it. The pool was very clean & inviting but the deck could use some added attention. The people we spoke to from the pool, frontdesk, and staff were all friendly & laid back. Over all we loved it & will return.

Reviews.Title: “Doss house!!!!”
Reviews.Author: speedyNorfolk
Reviews.Content: Put here by travel agent for last night as close to airport. I was appalled any decent human being would stay here, we arrived at 10pm as soon as we turned off freeway greeted by a bloke asking for money, the area is horrible and very scary, checked in and found the 'room' to be very basic, a bucket to wee in would not have been out of place!!!! We stayed for about 15mins then checked out!!! Booked in to a normal hotel. Never book this hotel if you want to sleep without thinking you could be robbed at any minute.

Reviews.Title: “good for the price”
Reviews.Author: Tor2_SP
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for 6 days and everything worked fine. the room is big but simple. the surroundings is calm but I was a little worried to walk around at night. I rented a car and I always had a parking lot for my car. True that during the weekend the main parking place ws full and I had to park behind the building but still.. I had no problem in this motel as I read in most reviews here. It is a low budget place to stay and is fair to the price you pay.

Reviews.Title: “Start of a PERFECT SUMMER:-D”
Reviews.Author: Nya24
Reviews.Content: Came down to miami from canada for a mini vacation for my daughter graduation, Stayed at Motel blu it was the best motel I have ever stayed in. you would think for the price and label motel you basically get what you pay for which is not so good service and accomadtions. But not in this case the website was not misleading at all. My daughter and I shared a single room the bed was more than big enough for the both of us and very comfortable. Our room had a little kitchenette with a refrigerator and microwave , since we stayed a week we bought our own lil snacks and drinks to eat. They had a light breakfast around 7 but since we were on vacation my daughter and I went to try different restaurants to eat. The pool was nice and clean . The employees were nice and very helpful. Told us the hotspots in miami. Overall I was more than impressed with the motel will most likely stay here on future vacations to miami and highly recommend to others to atleast check it out you will be surprised what an affordable rate can get you.

Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL EVER!! NEVER STAY HERE!!!”
Reviews.Author: coeljoco
Reviews.Content: This was the worst hotel ever, everything was broken, window cant lock. So you cant leave your suitcases in there! Its not safe. You can open the window from outside! ANd it was very dirty! En there were hoockers, at night there is a sign with RED LIGHT!! OMG , we go en search for another hotel. NOw we stay at DAYS INN ocean site. SO much better!! NEVER EVER GO SLEEP HERE>> AND NEVER BRING YOUR KIDSS HERE!!

Reviews.Title: “I enjoyed My Stay”
Reviews.Author: Romantic121
Reviews.Content: After reading some reviews I wasnt going to book But The Price I couldnt pass Up. The Pictures Of this Hotel are true and up to part. Beds were clean rugs were clean pool was so warm and clean I didnt want to get out It was nice and quiet the bathrooms were spotless And I loved all the mirrors in the room Will stay again

Reviews.Title: “Surprising stay at MOTEL BLU!!”
Reviews.Author: Gooneepush
Reviews.Content: I was really surprised when i arrived at motel blu, This place is not bad at all , boy do people over exaggerate. First, wonderful service. Second, clean room. Third, convient location, 15 mins away from Miami`s hot spots. Looking forward to bringing my family over to motel blu. And its all about customer service and they surely got it...

Reviews.Title: “Great experience for an affordable price”
Reviews.Author: dominque05
Reviews.Content: Stay at motel Blu a day before my cruise, and wow what an experience. I arrived late night on a Saturday, security guard was awesome night guy was also very nice and helpful. Room was nice and clean with an amazing aroma,pool was nice and clean restaurant was great. Will most likely come back next year for our next cruise. AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and affordable”
Reviews.Author: lacosteshirt
Reviews.Content: Travelled to Miami for a girls weekend, and found this motel for a good price. Free parking, breakfast, and wi-fi was an added bonus. Not too far from South Beach, but definitely not walking distance. We had a car so it was ok, but the guy at the front desk said we should take the bus since it would be cheaper than parking, and the bus stop is across the street. We hung out by the pool during the day and met a few people there, it seemed to be a busy place, with lots of people from out of the country. After all is said and done, service was great, rooms were comfortable, and clean, and the price was great. I would recommend this motel to my friends and family, and would definitely stay here again when I come back to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Service, location & cleanliness was great.”
Reviews.Author: Keyli07
Reviews.Content: i stayed at motel blu for one night at the beginning of may and I loved it. Everybody was friendly and kind. I will definitly go back to motel blu on our next visit to miami.

Reviews.Title: “pfft i dont even know what to say!!....”
Reviews.Author: funinthesun014
Reviews.Content: oh boy.... this hotel... first i want to start out by saying we got this place at a good deal!! and on one of the websites that we looked at it said that there was a phone alarm clock safe blow dryer iron and iron board , im also obbsessed with trip advisor so i was reading reviews with this hotel all the time and the one thing i noticed was the manager would comment on the reviews and say sorry and so on.... welllll i dont think in this case it will matter!! let me start with we phoned them everyday for a week and not on people could answer our simple question and we were even placed on hold for more then 20 mins before being hung up on the total in long distance charges was over 65$ i finally demanded to speak to the manager after arguing on the phone with one guy for 5 mins and the manager was quick to get me off the phone!! how UNPROFESSIONAL could someone be?? .... we finally get there and EKKK the area seemed a little shady but it was ok check in was easy besides the rude girl and we got to our room..... OH MY GOSH!!! i didnt have a phone, no alarm clock, no blow dryer.. NOTHING!! so i went to the front desk and by this time i was beyond mad and i wasnt very nice to the girl and she informed me they do wake up calls and they have a blow dryer to use and you can use their phone when ever you want.... ok after i calmed down it didnt seem so bad i even went and said sorry to the poor girl .. it seemed to be a busy hotel and lots of friendly people we went for a walk and it was actually a nice area.. anyways on the second day we were gone all day to come back to our room not clean, thats ok we didnt mind that night i went to go ask for toilet paper and had to wake the freaking kid up and after 15 mins of trying to get him up he finally got up and was as rude as could be .. like how dare i wake him up!! .. the next day our room still didnt get cleaned so the following day we had to ask the roommaids to clean the room!! that night i had to wait 10 mins for the kid to get of the phone with what sounded to be a buddie and i ask to use the phone , he then says to me uhh we only have one line so make it snappy!!!! WHO SAYS THAT?!?! later on that night i had to go ask him for something once again he was sleeping after a few mins of trying to wake him up i gave up!! PATHETIC!! our room was only cleaned the once, we did get a wake up call he did wake us up , 20 mins late mind ya but he did bang until we answered the door! so yay for that!! ...the beds were good ... we loved the pool and it was very clean, i couldnt tell you about the tv, showers were good , there is a restaurant there people said it was good, the AC worked good... however i will probably never stay there again even if it is the very last hotel in miami!! im not a picky person im always a repeat traveler i stay where i know but in this case , unless the can fix this which i doubt the manager would even care to do so , i will never go there again.... when i got home i found out that my mom had phoned me a number of times (she is a very sick lady) and left messages "with a young man" and i NEVER GOT ON MESSAGE!! if anything would have happened back home and i DIDNT get my messages how would they even begin to explain that?!?! ...if anyone has questions please feel free to ask and i will answer as honest as i can!!

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel I've ever been too”
Reviews.Author: whulfc86
Reviews.Content: Prostitutes working and walking around, rooms can be rented by the hour, saw a syringe on the balcony. Promptly left and found another hotel. It's in a terrible neighbourhood, people walking through traffic begging for money. Did not feel safe at all.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: dara_11
Reviews.Content: MOTEL BLU is value for moneyit is not the Ritz but that is not what we paid. The manger Chris is very helpful and so is the front office staff, the security guard is funny. WE attended an expo in Miami Beach and we were on a budget so we got a room with 2 double beds for 3 persons, our room was brand new, new pillow top mattress, new pillow and a new clean bathroom, we checked everything because being a budget motel you worry. we spent very little time at the motel we went out early and camr back late everyday for 4 days. we went to aventura mall which is about 50mins away, we went to sawgrass mills which a coach bus picked us up by the american airlines areana about 20mins away by bus which we took everywhere and we also took the train we felt very comfortable and relaxed. I called the motel a few times before we got their just to help plan our itinery and they were very helpful. The motel is not in a "touristy"I but it is close enogh about 20mins from airport 20mins from port of Miami. We were not on vacation we did not hang out at the pool we wanted some where convienent, clean and economical and this was perfect for our needs. I you are not going to spend alot of time at the motel and you are on a budget good choice.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay !”
Reviews.Author: cleogirl_havingfun
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel before our cruise, great location, not too far from Miami port. We found alot of shopping and restaurants near by, great location for all that too! We did not feel at all insecure walking around at night, and sleep really well !!! Our room was also quite modern and clean, and great, friendly staff !!! Good price per night too! All the best to all the staff at Motel Blur, we will be back !!

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great price and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: danielfunfun
Reviews.Content: We booked at this hotel for 2 nights only before our cruise. This area is suppose to be not too good, but we were surprised! It is quite safe! Its 2 minutes walk from the local bus stop that brings you direct to miami beach in less than 20 minutes for $2. Across there is a Wendy and Taco Bell restaurant, also gas station that is a open 24h and has a nice convenience store. The hotel was built in the 50`s but looks like the owner is doing a major renovation job. The room we stayed in was perfect, nice swimming pool and also little river near manetee area! Nice little restaurant called Red Light. Overall it was perfect for us!

Reviews.Title: “Not a great experience”
Reviews.Author: Summer34607
Reviews.Content: South Beach had 4 star Hotels for $30.00 more. My room had fleas...no heat. I was afraid to walk my dog. Pool and surounding area was dirty Nothing like the website. Staff was very friendly and security was very helpful. Would not stay there again or recommend this motel . Funky smell in room ............nice bathroom and clean sheets ...........that's about it .

Reviews.Title: “No complaints”
Reviews.Author: Paperplanes1234
Reviews.Content: Place was all that I needed. Clean rooms, free wi-fi, and nice pool. Breakfast was only cakes and coffee but what more can you expect for the low price you pay. The people were nice and helped me plan my day trip around Miami. Stay here if you want a nice place to stay for a low price. I recommend

Reviews.Title: “Most disgusting experience in a motel”
Reviews.Author: TripGorilla
Reviews.Content: 3 of us stayed in this so called motel for one night on our way back from Keywest. i can tell you that nothing, absolutely nothing was right except that the building did not fall upon our heads.. first of all the location was quite scary, but it did not bother us since we just wanted a place to sleep. The guy in charge at night (around 11:00 pm) was very rude and even told us that there were no rooms available that night even though we booked online and had the confirmation number. We were joking later of what he said when he gave us the room keys: "youre all set".. haha.. all set??. you enter the room and find a big, good for nothing furniture taking up all space in the room and making even hard to walk within the room.. There was not even telephone or any other way to call room service or any other "service" if that was there. Not only that, we only could find one power socket to which we had to hook up our laptop. The bathroom door did not lock. A part of the room carpet was damp and the bathroomand had a filthy smell. In the morning the toilet did not flush and the water did not clear. We had to go downstairs to let them know, it was a lady this time who called someone and a guy came to hand us a plunger/pumper whatever, to do our own fixing. That was not the end of it, i went downstairs to my car only to see it covered with dust from construction going on some part of the building. They did not even bother to let us know or tell us to move our car. Workers disoriented the side-view mirrors of the car badly and we were lucky not to have them broken. When we went to the lady in charge that time, she acted like this is a very normal thing that has happened. We wanted to talk to the manager but she said we cannot. and said that she can only give the email address of the manager and not his phone number. We were really frustrated at this point and I asked her that who will be responsible for cleaning our car since they could not take care of it the way they should have? the lady became rude, but pressing on with our complains made her call the manager who talked to us in a way as if these things are so normal to expect in a motel..... wtf? the manager gave a 20 dollar compensation for the trouble.. and expected us to digest the horrible experience as quickly as possible, but we were really looking for the appropriate authority to complain officially. Anyways, it was a horrible horrible experience, i will not stay there if offered even 20 dollars per night.. .. just dont even think of going there..

Reviews.Title: “Awful - avoid it at all costs”
Reviews.Author: ej1986
Reviews.Content: I spend a night at Motel Blu with my boyfriend and it was an absolutely horrendous experience. First impressions were not good due to the area - the motel is right next to a strip club, we saw prostitutes on the street corner just down the road and it felt very unsafe at night. The room was dreadful. There were 3 lamps but only one of them worked so the room was very dark. The plug sockets were cracked and seemed unsafe. There was a very strong damp smell in the room. After using the toilet, the flush would not stop running and a load of brown silt backed up into the toilet bowl. We decided to ask for another room since the toilet was making such a loud noise. The receptionist obliged and gave us a key for another room. This was even worse. The door did not close securely - there was a large gap, which was very worrying considering the unsafe area. The new room also smelled very damp, there were stains on the carpet and there were cigarette burns in the quilt cover. Most worrying was that instead of a smoke alarm on the ceiling there was just a large hole with wires hanging out. The bed was rock hard and very uncomfortable. I had a terrible night's sleep as I was worried that someone would break into the room due to the door not locking securely. It was a terrible experience and I would advise other travelers to stay well away.

Reviews.Title: “AVOID AT ANY COST”
Reviews.Author: sandeeppotdar
Reviews.Content: Their website is so nice that I thought I should give them a try inspite of the terrible reviews that they have. It was my mistake. BIG mistake. I enter the motel at night and am given Room 216. The room is shabby, dark and cheap. Their website advertises 32 inch TVs in all rooms!! What a joke! It was cold in Miami but we werent provided blankets and the door has gaps that let cold air come in. Next morning I spoke to the Manager and he says "we're cutting costs by not providing blankets or heaters!" Wow! The most basic thing one needs in a room is toilet paper. There was none. I called up Frontdesk (using my cellphone ofcourse because they dont have room phones) and asked for toilet paper. They said I'd get it in a moment. After 45 min I again called up to see why they hadn't sent the toilet paper and I was asked to look for the Maid around the corridors. After 20 min a guy came and gave me toilet paper and I could relieve my pressure!! Then I try to take a shower and there is no warm/hot water. Miami was 17 degrees F that day. The manager only says "Sorry for the inconvenience" when I complain to him about all this. I tell him how the website paints a different picture of the motel and how different they actually and he says, "We're changing & improving slowly!". Hah.. Then pls mention that on your website. AND for heaven's sake, make sure your rooms have toilet paper. Bottomline: Spend those 60 bucks at a better place rather. You'll find plenty of 'cleaner' & 'better' places at that rate in Miami.

Reviews.Title: “If you have no other choice.”
Reviews.Author: Mr_Sun69
Reviews.Content: We â€“ 2 adults and 2 minors 15 & 16 stayed over night prior to us sailing out the next day on our cruise. Rooms were ok, but watch yourself if you need to leave the room for anything. Neighborhood is not the best, we didnâ€™t have any trouble, but we sure were carful. Cool restaurant next door. The outdoor pool was great.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place with Great Value”
Reviews.Author: LucasOliva
Reviews.Content: This was the 5th time I stayed at Motel Blu, and I liked every single day of my stay. The crew is nice and friendly, the parking lot has plenty space and is always watched by a security guard. The Pool area is a little messy, but still a great place to hangout a little. Also thereÂ´s a very nice restaurant with good food and drink, and at saturdays the place is always full. About the area where the Motel is, I just heard from de neighbours thatÂ´s is not just this place that is not safe anymore, but the whole Florida has a safety problem. But as the place is ALWAYS WATCHED, never heard of a problem... This place is REALLY GREAT, thereÂ´s a WendyÂ´s across the street, a Subway very near, and a President SuperMarket. The lastest time I stayed, I met the owner of the place Chris, a very nice guy, very helpfull, he is always watching and taking care of his clients. Next time in Miami, I will stay at Motel Blu AGAIN! ;-D

Reviews.Title: “don't stay at this motel. a real dump!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: tvlenman
Reviews.Content: this motel does not live up to it's online site. the place is a dump, to say the least. 1st the motel location is in a very bad area. I couldn't believe it!! second the room was small and dingy looking. all of the furniture was old and beat up. and there were other people using the pool that were not staying there. I felt safe. how ever if your a women traveling alone, I would not stay at this place. basicly the place is a DUMP!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Felt at Home!”
Reviews.Author: JmIOS
Reviews.Content: I was a little apprehensive having read a number of negative reviews and must admit as I drove into the motel car park I thought â€œWhat have I doneâ€�! However once parked a fellow guest welcomed me reassuringly said itâ€™s not that bad here bud! I received a warm welcome at the reception and found my room large, basic but very clean. True some of the decoration was a bit tired as was some of the carpet and furniture but it was all fit for purpose. My room was serviced every day and fresh towels and linen were supplied each day. The pool was clean but the area around the pool was a little messy. This was not down to the motel as they did clean the pool area but mainly down to fellow guests who failed to clear away their litter. There were no room safes or safety deposit boxes; however you could leave valuables in the hotel safe. I used this and nothing went missing! As for safety, I felt safe and secure in this motel and the surrounding area, yes there is a strip club over the canal but to be honest, and unless you plan to visit it you probably wouldnâ€™t notice it. Like all USA motels the breakfast was only coffee and doughnuts. There are many eateries within walking distance as well as a supermarket and other shops. So you can get most of your supplies on the doorstep. The motel also has its own restaurant. It looked popular but I did not eat there. A tip for anyone taking a car is to leave it in the car park and take the bus downtown or to the beaches. Busses stop outside the motel and for a flat fare of $2 you can get to the beaches or downtown with ease. You can also buy unlimited travel for $5 dollars a day valid for both busses and metro. It is so much cheaper than paying to park your car. I had a relaxing stay and the helpful staff gave the motel a homely feel. I would recommend this establishment for those wishing for a cheap, clean and cheerful place to stay and a moderate price. If you are looking for five star service and facilities then forget it.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Location.....”
Reviews.Author: aurgelles
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for a few nights, the staff was great. My room was clean and very updated. Location is in a Art Deco district. Plenty to do around the hotel, easy access to the beach and shopping. Very safe area, would recommend for family travel....

Reviews.Title: “Best Western is 3 miles away... SAME price. Do not stay at Blu.”
Reviews.Author: Thelxepeia
Reviews.Content: I arrived yesterday with my children, the little girl was afraid to get out of the car as it looked 'scary' to her. What no one tells you is right next door is a live 'nudie' bar, the traffic is LOUD, the rooms are SMALL and the floors were FILTHY. I looked into the room and it looked fine, but when I walked in it was a different story. The door locks are flimsy, the gaping space between the door and door frame a rodent could have invited himself in. I told the desk clerk that my daughter refused to get out of the car, and explained that her Christianity would not allow her to stay the night next to the activity next door and could he please cancel my credit card payment. He refused, but did say if I would have paid cash he'd return it... but his boss would see that the CC Payment was returned and he could get in trouble, so needless to say I will be contacting my Visa account. Right down the road 3 miles is a BEST WESTERN that is the same price.. and the rooms were TWICE the size, clean, well air conditioned and the service was GREAT. The Denny's across the street offers a 20% discount for those that stay at the hotel. DO NOT STAY AT MOTEL BLU.. the pictures are so NOT what you will get!

Reviews.Title: “Wasn't bad - wasn't great either”
Reviews.Author: toyotoyotoyo
Reviews.Content: This was one of many hotels/motels we stayed in during our 10 day roadtrip from South Florida to Western Colorado. This motel is located in Little Haiti right by a stripclub. The area itself wasn't too pleasing but there was at least a security guard for the parking lot. The parking lot is very small so make sure you get there early enough to snag one of the spots otherwise you may have to park out in the back - not advisable. The girl who checked us in was less than friendly but at least the check in was swift. There's a little restaurant right outside this motel and the menu looked delightful but we didn't end up eating there - there was an 1 1/2 wait for a table so I'm sure it was good. The room was not very clean but the airconditioning worked and the bed was comfortable and clean enough to sleep in for one night. The bathroom wasn't terribly clean either but again - good enough for a night's stay. The worst/weirdest part of this motel was that our back window was looking out into an abandoned, filthy pool (not Motel Blu's property) with cats all around it. Just close the windows and you'll be fine:) So all in all, this motel was fine but nothing to write home about. I've always been the type of person who's concerned with safety and cleanliness but I'm also on a budget so this hotel was a good enough compromise. I would recommend this hotel to someone who's in the same situation as me but not to someone who is expecting a nice, relaxing getaway.

Reviews.Title: “Don't ever go for this cheap motel”
Reviews.Author: sadgurls
Reviews.Content: ufff i am laughing at the comments above.... there is this tragic story behind this ugly cheap motel. had we known gettin a good deal would come with sleepless nights we would have paid $20 more and gone to a decent inn/motel. we arrived around midnight and the manager gave us the keys to our room. we went in the a/c wasnt working..good lord in the month of June we almost slept fanning each other for the rest of the night. the other morning we went out in the morning left the a/c on and whn we came back the a/c was turned off and the room was hot. to top that no soap in the bathroom..i had to wash my hands with the shampoo i took with me..ridiculous.. we went and complained and the staff was considerate enough to move us next door and My god there was something about that crazy room..scared the hellt out of us three had to move back to the original room...then another sleepless night...we went and asked for the soap and the lady working that shift told us there were none and after arguing with her she finally gave me 3-4 saying tats all i had to adjust with...god this is the heights of everything.. we paid almost 60$ /night. if this is what we get (sleepless nights) i'd pay $20 more and stay in a motel with good a/c and definitely safe (btw there was a strip club right next to the motel) and i guess this is the worst area in entire miami...a ghetto style cheap motel..I will never recommend anyone...

Reviews.Title: “The strip club next door was classier than the motel itself.”
Reviews.Author: rickboudreau
Reviews.Content: Well, the first room we were told to stay in, was an absolute disgrace. Where should i start.... -we walked in, and the light on the ceiling fan didnt work, -then the air conditioner didnt work -there were no fitted sheets...just regular sheets tucked into the bed -the toilet flushed adequately (as long as you used the plunger everytime you have to do your business) -there was no phone -no clock -no remote for the TV -NO water pressure in the shower, of which you needed to wear some type of foot protection so you wouldt catch any type of fungal-foot disease However, we requested a different room, and we were given a room with a fully functioning toilet, and air conditioner, and very comfortable beds. The second room was very nice, but the TV's remote didnt belong to that TV. The pool was fantastic, and was a very nice surprise. I would give the first room .0005 stars, and the second room 3.5 stars, and the pool 5 stars

Reviews.Title: “Really Nice”
Reviews.Author: tammyroberts
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the other reviews I was surprised to see that people did not like this place. So here's my opinion: Rooms: It wasn't fancy, but had a brand new bathroom, comfy beds, spacious, and clean! Staff: The staff is very friendly. Young, energetic staff who helped us plan our entire weekend! Even the maids were super sweet. Pool: pretty cool, and clean, we hung out there one day and just listened to the music and went for a dip. Location: the area seems like its "up and coming", as a group of girls, we didn't have any problems walking around the area for food, or shopping. They have alot of food options in the area. Fast food across the street and casual to fine dining restaurants down the road, all within walking distance. They have a restaurant at Motel Blu too, but we didn't eat there. All in all, I liked Motel Blu. Clean rooms, friendly staff, convenient location, what more can you ask for? I would definitely recommend this to my friends, and will go back whenever I come to Miami again.

Reviews.Title: “Vibrant Motel w/ a Vibrant Staff”
Reviews.Author: Wyatt_20
Reviews.Content: We arrived late nite to the motel. We were scared our room was given away, since the parking lot was full and the NO VACANCY light was on. When we walked towards the frontdesk we were greeted with open arms, the staff was just fabulous! They were very helpfull on providing directions and suggestiing hidden places to see in Miami! The room was just fine it was clean it had a bed and a bathroom. What else can you ask for?! We are sure we will come back here again. Thank You Motel Blu for the wonderfull stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “Old but nice, clean, good pool, excellent WiFi, terrific value for money”
Reviews.Author: Sjors62
Reviews.Content: There is nothing wrong with this hotel, except maybe the area, but this didn't cause any problems. Very pleasant reception, large clean room, good bed, good shower, nice pool, excellent WiFi, terrific value for money. Some rooms have been re-furbished, some have not. That might explain the difference in appreciation for the quality of the rooms. Free guarded parking. Definitely a winner.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised!”
Reviews.Author: woolri63
Reviews.Content: People usually only go out of their way to write one of these reviews if their experience is negative, so the idea of "trip advisor" is a good one; however, it is negatively bias! We stayed at Motel Blu for 5 days and I was pleasantly surprised! :) When we first arrived, we weren't completely satisfied with our room because the blind didn't close all the way and it was right next to the parking lost. When we asked if they had any other rooms available, the staff was INCREDIBLY accomodating! We ended up switching to a single room up by the pool and it was soooo quaint! It had double mirrors, a little cute kitchen, remodeled room (and bathroom), a sitting area, and plenty of space. The staff at the motel were really nice and helped us with calling for cabs and directions around the city. The pool was very clean and the area around the pool was a great spot to enjoy your time/vacation! Plus, coffee was always available in the lobby! :) And, the actual location is great! It was right on one of the buslines that dropped off downtown at bicentennial park and up to adventura mall! The only downfall of the motel (I thought) was the location. If you are from a city, you will understand, but at night I didn't feel very comfortable outside. However, during the day it was fabulous!

Reviews.Title: “We had low expectations, but they still sucked”
Reviews.Author: thenglishman
Reviews.Content: We had low expectations because of the price we paid, but after booking a room for 4, they put us in a room with 1 king bed. They promised to bring a roll away up and move us in the morning, they did neither. We asked for a roll away on 6 different occasions and they never did, but were reassured every time that it would be. The security guard only had it on his list that 2 people were in the room, so we had to argue with him every time to get into our room. Barely any hot water, not enough towels, just an over all dive located next to a strip club. They over booked the hotel by quite a bit. Every time I went to the lobby to check on our roll away (since they don't have phones to call the desk) there were at least 2 groups standing at the counter being turned down because the hotel "lost their reservation." To top it all off they came by in the morning pounding on our door a half our before checkout time telling us to get out. The pictures on their website are a joke. Don't stay here. Its not worth the money saved.

Reviews.Title: “Oh my goodness”
Reviews.Author: SanDiegoRic
Reviews.Content: We checked in and found the room to be moderately clean. The bed was hard no phone in the room and the a/c in the first room was very noisey. It appeared that there was a confrontation in the bathroom with chipped tiles and one (1) bar of soap. Towels are much like hankies. Toilet paper was rough. However we decided to return after a sojourn to the "keys" for a few days. The price doubled and the room deteriorated. It was unseasonably cold and we asked about a heater. There was none and we inquired about an extra cover. We got another sheet. Brrrrrr. We were sure glad to board our Ship for a cruise. Looks like we won't be back to that hotel. The red light restaurant next door was delightful and the food terrific.

Reviews.Title: “A total dump”
Reviews.Author: Tatiana69
Reviews.Content: I write this review covered in bed bug bites for a start. I had read reviews and expected a mildly charming, basically decent motel. I wish. Besides the bed bugs, this place was incredibly dingy, missing window blinds, with the kind of scuzzy bathroom you would expect from a $50 a night motel (not even a toilet paper holder, to give you an idea of how low budget it is). I think they have some smart marketers who try to present the place as "newly renovated". Don't get fooled by the photos either. And if you choose to ignore this message, just remember you were warned.

Reviews.Title: “4 a business man on a short trip it's ok”
Reviews.Author: KcGong
Reviews.Content: Motel Blu this was the only available hotel around SuperBowl Wknd available for less than$200.00 us. As business man like my self it was ok , pool, parking , cable, WiFi .. it was kool i give it 6/10 not bad , thanx u Amoss 4 good service getting me a nice room located next 2 d pool ..... The Restaurant is on D River its called Red light little river this is D BOMB it has the #7 rated Chef in the USA , great food ABSOLUTELY i try the Sour Orange , sticky grilled sword fish , Asparagus & Calabazza house potatoes, only $18.00 , also i had Scotch Bonnet vivaneau (Snapper )haitian chocolate rice & squash sauce , $17.00 dammmm very good food ,

Reviews.Title: “Low budget barely barely adequate”
Reviews.Author: db27513
Reviews.Content: Only stay here if you have to. I got the room for about $70, and it is convenient to Miami Beach (driving), but the rooms basically suck. They do appear to be clean at least, but everything is worn. Loud music blasting over the pool area (which they turned off), wireless doesnt work, pull down shade broken, no non-stealable hangers, bed has hard thin mattress.. no show stoppers, but plan on spending most of your time out of the room. Cant wait to leave. Some pretty questionable clientel hanging about. Best thing about this place is the sign.

Reviews.Title: “Adequate for one night, wouldn't want to stay much longer”
Reviews.Author: NightLion
Reviews.Content: We were only in Miami for Saturday night before departing on our cruise Sunday. I chose the Blu because of its reasonable rate, good-enough reviews, and airport/cruise port shuttle (costs extra). The room was kind of dark, and had something of a body odor smell. No phone in the room either. There's free wireless internet but it crashed frequently. Check-out time was 11 AM, but the cruise shuttle wouldn't be by until noon. We figured that checkout times are usually soft guidelines, so we'd stick around until noon, but somebody came knocking at our door shortly after 11 basically telling us we had to get out. Fortunately the front desk clerk was nice enough to let us put our luggage behind her desk until the shuttle arrived, otherwise we would have had to sit outside with our bags for an hour. The restaurant on-site was pretty nice if a little overpriced, frankly a little too nice to be at the Motel Blu.

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Surprise - You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Kasherry
Reviews.Content: First impressions count and upon arrival to Motel Blu, my first time in the US, i wasn't pleased. The area seems run down and not like Miami we see on TV. However, after leaving my passport in the cab from the airport, the staff at Motel Blu were like CSI Miami tracking the driver down and did everything and anything possible to help - their sincerity and kindness was far beyond what a 5* hotel would have probably offered. So, it's a cheap motel - dont expect The Ritz, it's not. I didnt like my first allocated room and they happily changed it and the second one was fine: comfy beds, clean sheets, air con worked fine. Yes, the decor is a bit dated and the furniture is a bit old but for a no frills 3 days stay, what do you want? The area turned out to be great and not as dodgy as first impressions make it out. We ate it at a local Peruvian restaurant behind Wendys and at a local diner which does THE Best banana pancakes. The location was fine, in between Bayside, Downtown and a 20min bus ride to SoBo. If you dont mind exploring then this Motel is perfect and to be honest, by not staying smack bang in the middle of SoBo, we got to see so much more of the 'real' Miami. i can't thank the staff enough, they really were great and I'd recommend this motel if youre on a quick trip, want a cheap place and aren't expecting the world for your $. Be realistic, you get what you pay for. I'd stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: susyarcy
Reviews.Content: This place is disgusting and scary. Don't stay there. The rooms are dirty, the people that were staying were scary.. NO NO NO

Reviews.Title: “Customer service was great and rooms were a surprise!”
Reviews.Author: mistie66
Reviews.Content: This hotel had really great customer service. The front desk gentlemen was friendly and helpful. We were able to stash our bags in the back room and they also charged my camera for me without hesitation. The manager approached us to ask how our stay was and chatted with us for a bit. The room was clean, and suprisingly larger that we expected for the price we paid (only $67). The pool was clean. The hotel is small and at first glance looks like it's on the lower side of quality, but this is deceiving. The area was okay with a historical district, but it's not close to the beach. The restaurant was a pricey, but had a great view!! Luckily there are many other places to eat just a few blocks up the street. I would recommend this to anyone who does not prefer large fancy hotels! Thanks Motel Blu for the great service!!

Reviews.Title: “it was GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: iluvyou
Reviews.Content: LOVED IT! great customer service...perfect location...clean rooms and at a great price i would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...”
Reviews.Author: Fiver75
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my time at the Motel Blu just fine. Sure, it is showing its' age a little, but for the price it is decent. The room was comfortable enough, with good storage space and a comfortable bed. I would have liked a fridge in my room, but that seems to be rare in this price range. The wifi signal was good and net access was reasonably fast. My room (217) was behind the pool and remained quiet throughout the day and night. The pool is definitely the highlight of this hotel - big, clean and comfortable! The reception area has an ATM, a microwave, a public phone, a snack machine and a computer with internet access, so they cover most necessities here. The reviews here seem to be a bit contradictory. If you want a room with fresh paint and shiny surfaces, then pay more and get another hotel. If you don't mind a few rough edges, then Motel Blu will suit you fine! Just remember, you get what you pay for...

Reviews.Title: “Its good value,But”
Reviews.Author: Mylieboy
Reviews.Content: Stayed here October 2009 room 223. Firstly for the money its a room to sleep in,but the rooms are not recently refurbished as some feedback states.A large amount of the rooms are closed and stripped of plaster and no work going on.On returning to our room on the second night we found that the smoke alarm was beeping every two mins,when i asked reception to fix it they said cant do it until the next day,and we were expected to spend the night in a room with the alrm still sounding.Ater requeting to see the manager we were given another room.The rooms have no phone,no iron,no coffee/tea making equipment and are only just passable.The public areas are very poor and dirty,dont bother with the breakfast as its just a mini cake and vile coffee. Without a car youve had it as local resturants are few and poor,its a 15minute drive to I hop and Dennys..

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable, large secure rooms with nice amenities”
Reviews.Author: kgmarketingcr
Reviews.Content: Thanks Doug and Chris (and Staff), I enjoyed my short stay and the special accomodations made...would visit again. Good job on service and expectations... Ken in Costa Rica

Reviews.Title: “Don't Believe the Website!! And Don't Use Travelocity!!”
Reviews.Author: LawAbidingCitizen
Reviews.Content: So, this was almost 2 years ago, but the MOTEL is such an engrained memory that I just had to give my late review. What a DISASTER! I was with my gf at the time, staying for New Year's weekend. I didn't expect anything spectacular, but maybe decent. NOT EVEN CLOSE! As the other bad reviews say, don't believe the website! The rooms are disgusting, the locks aren't even deadbolted! Anyway, here is my story... On New Year's Eve, after spending the day in South Beach, we headed back to the motel. Since our flight was to leave at 630am the next morning, we wanted to get some sleep right when we got back. Well, when we got there, our key wouldn't unlock the door! Not only that, but we heard people moving and talking inside...I knocked on the door and no one answered. (probably the hotel manager with a prostitute or something) When going to the lobby to complain, the intoxicated (high/drunk/just out there) dude at the front desk gave me the biggest line of crap. He said we checked out at 4pm earlier that day! I said, now how can I possibly have checked out, if I HAVE THE KEY RIGHT HERE!!! The 'dude' and the parking attendant, only had nametags with their first names, and of course they wouldn't give me the phone number to thier manager or thier info. I called the police, but of course they didn't come...it was New Years Eve. At that point, all I wanted was my stuff back. I asked the 'dude', and he said he had no idea, but it wasn't in the room. So, something was up, VERY SHADY. I kept asking, where is my damn stuff!!??? I pleaded with the parking attendant to help me figure it out. He finally went with me to search...We finally found our suitcases and loose items in a trash bag inside a dirty storage/maintenance closet! What a bunch of [--]! After this, I refused to leave the 2nd floor balcony till the cops arrived...but after calling and calling and waiting and waiting they never showed. Of course, we had to leave for our flight, so we left the hell hole at 4am. I guess that places like this exist all over the place...no surprise there. But for TRAVELOCITY to be involved with a place like this? I didn't expect that. So from now on, I won't trust Travelocity...

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great pool!!!”
Reviews.Author: hdtv430
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very comfortable and clean. The staff was very friendly and attentive to our requests. This motel is closeby to the beach and downtown. If you're looking to save money and time finding parking, public transportation is easy and close by. The pool was wonderful and relaxing and had a great setting. I would definitely come back for another stay because of the warm staff and unique atomsphere. It definitely deserves a 5 star rating!

Reviews.Title: “Very deceiving, do not believe website”
Reviews.Author: beckyflag
Reviews.Content: Air conditioner didn't work. Was told, "nothing can be done" was not offered a different room with working features. Floor cracked, mirror broken on closet door, non-working remote for T.V. Not pictured as online images whatsoever! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise”
Reviews.Author: travelersNc
Reviews.Content: What a gem! Motel Blu is the most pleasant surprise we have found in a motel in years. We stayed four nights. It was quiet during all hours of day and night. Service was very attentive and thoughtful. While we did not try the on-site restaurant, we found four very good restaurants; two asian, one italian, and one argentinean, within ten blocks along Biscayne. We felt safe both on the premises and in the surrounding area. And the motel location is convenient from I-95, from the beach, from the airport, and from downtown. We will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, helpful staff. Safe and well located.”
Reviews.Author: WildHorsesFM
Reviews.Content: Economical for all types of travellers. Nice swimming pool. Clean and spacious rooms with air- con. Faiyaaz Moidin (South Africa)

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel, Clean and Friendly!”
Reviews.Author: cbart1132
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I stayed at Motel Blu for vacation this year and we had a great experience! The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and as described. Very comfortable! It did however take a few times asking before we finally got our microwave but everything else was superb. The pool was beautiful and kept clean. The security was very nice, friendly and helpful! The area was very convenient with a store, gas station and Wendy's within walking distance. I was however a little upset on the day we were supposed to check we decided to stay one more night and was charged for the price I paid for two nights so that bothered me. But overall the experience was great and when we return to Miami we will be sure to stay there again and again and recommend this Motel to others!

Reviews.Title: “Good Service generally, friendly staff, but rooms need improving.”
Reviews.Author: vm1425
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 7 nights in July and it was generally a comfortable stay - friendly, professional staff ready to help, particularly Lady, Kris. It was close to the bus route to South Beach but this was at least 2 dollars one way. The room I stayed in was clean however had no proper curtains - just a cloth hung from the curtain rail, blinds were falling off, the room was extremely hot despite using a fan and air-con and breakfast lacked variety of tastes. Inspite of this, I would return because of the great atmosphere and friendly staff. Overall a good hotel, but still needs improving.

Reviews.Title: “good value for the money”
Reviews.Author: donnasl
Reviews.Content: We found Motel Blu to be very much as described on their website and not unlike many of the reviews on trip advisor. It is, I believe, a work of continuing progress and was suitable for our need of a place to stay the night before embarking on a cruise out of Miami. The pool area is quite pleasant and the motel is convenient to the downtown area and a short and pleasant ride to the port. Chris and the rest of the staff were helpful and gave us an excellent rate for a room, parking, and a shuttle to the port the morning of our cruise. Chris even emailed after the trip to make sure we were happy with the experience. If you are looking for a luxury hotel, keep looking, but if you are looking for a good value in a unique setting, you have found your hotel. We would certainly consider staying again if cruising out of the Miami port.

Reviews.Title: “A real Diamond in a Rough!”
Reviews.Author: Kunzz
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on this botique motel. And may I say a well good choice I made. Right when we got there the service was top tier. Overall staff from housekeepers to frontdesk to the mangement team were very attaintive to my requests. Houskeepers always left an extra towel on our request, the frontdesk clerks had abundunt knowledge of the area, they assisted and reccommended places to see and eat. I don't understand how Motel Blu provides a 5 star service atmosphere for 2 star prices. I don't know how they do it, but they won my vote and my business for future stays.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay.”
Reviews.Author: CrazyKorean
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very clean, and the pool is amazing. The only motel in area with a restaurant and the pool area is terrific. Stay at Motel Blu and you won't be dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: “Great pool outside of Miami Beach”
Reviews.Author: nitsswole
Reviews.Content: This place has a great pool outside of Miami Beach. Friendly staff... Very nice restaurant connected to motel. It is centrally located close to shopping, night life, and Miami Beach. I would stay at this place over and over again...

Reviews.Title: “What A Good Deal”
Reviews.Author: mrscho79
Reviews.Content: We are on a backpacking trip and must have stayed in at least 30 different motels throughout the US over the past couple of months. We decided on Motel Blu simply because it was amongst the lowest priced options on a couple of online booking engines. We were very heartened by the good reviews and are happy to confirm that this place is indeed a good deal. The people at the reception, security guard and valet (who parks the cars for diners visiting the Red Light eatery, adjacent to the hotel) were all very friendly. Parking is free and there were always sufficient lots (which, I've read, is not the case for motels nearer to South Beach.) The room was one of the nicest we have had for the price we paid. It was different from your run-of-the-mill hotel chain rooms. You can tell some effort was put into coordinating the simple decor. It was of a good size and everything worked well - the TV, the lamps, the air-conditioning unit and all the waterworks. The bathroom even looked quite pretty! The bed was huge for 2 persons and very comfortable. The pool and poolside area were clean and comfortable, and many guests were using the pool throughout our stay. The free WiFi worked very well. Motel Blu is conveniently located on US Hwy 1, making it incredibly easy to head for North Miami, South Beach, Downtown and Key Biscayne. Despite this, it is amazingly quiet inside the room throughout the day. There's a huge supermarket and various fastfood outlets around the motel. Driving north on Hwy 1, you will come across many more supermarkets (Walgreens, KMart, Target) and eateries, including an IHOP (one of the best for quality of food and service.) A minimal breakfast is provided at the motel till 10am but runs out pretty early. The guy at the reception recommended walking to Jim's Diner for great food. We had intended to spend most of our 5 days in Miami at South Beach. But driving north on the US1 to Sunny Isles was so convenient, and Haulover Beach had ample parking lots at US$5 for the day - much cheaper and more convenient than streetside parking at South Beach. The beach and water at Haulover is just as pretty as that on South Beach, if you're looking for a less crowded place to hang out at. The restaurant at Majestic Hotel along Ocean Drive at South Beach has pretty good breakfast at $4.95. The spinach and mushroom omelet is enough to fill you up for a good half a day of lying on the beach. All in all, you're in for a good deal at Motel Blu. We value safety alot and felt very comfortable and at-home at this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Best Motel Ever”
Reviews.Author: NikkiTheNetherlands
Reviews.Content: We had a great time in this Motel! The staff was very friendly and always willing to help. We didn't expect much of it (motels ussually dont really have a good name) but the rooms were very clean, the beds were great and there was everything that we needed. We'll be back in miami in august and we're definetely gonna stay here again (saves us more money to shop:-) X Aisha & Nikki

Reviews.Title: “Had a Blast This memorial day poolside @ the Blu”
Reviews.Author: Boondaboys
Reviews.Content: Me and my boys drove down to miami for memorial day weekend, booked two rooms.. the rooms were a bit basic but the party by the pool this pass Saturday and the super helpful staff made up for it. We mainly were on south beach the whole weekend..but Motel blu was cool for just a safe place to rest your head. I did not run into any crackheads, boggey men, monsters or roaches ;-) And Im from the ATL and I know what a crack head looks like. There is also a little restaurant on property... which had some banging barbecue shrimp.... there is even this old guy that works security I swear he needs his own reality tv show.....

Reviews.Title: “very comfortable, especially for the price”
Reviews.Author: oldmathprof
Reviews.Content: for an inexpensive (at least for Miami) motel, the room was surprisingly comfortable and quiet. I was at the back end of the motel and heard no road noise, something very unusual for South Florida and especially since the hotel is right on Biscayne Blvd. Although there was little near the hotel, it wasn't too bad getting into the Downtown area via the local bus service. I would definitely consider staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad place at all”
Reviews.Author: goodsport38
Reviews.Content: There were no crackheads pounding at my door nor were there any rats. The nude show next door was OK. I went in there 3/4 nude too and the people there were receptive. If you don't like it, don't go in. The neighborhood was not as bad as people say. I had no problem getting around, good bus service. The guy and the the gals at the front desk were very nice people. Yes it is an old building but they are working to make it better

Reviews.Title: “ok for the price. Not sure what all the fuss is about!”
Reviews.Author: dick6800
Reviews.Content: I travelled last week. Reception was great, offered grd or 1st flr. Room is a bit basic, no kettle, etc, however for Â£226 for 5 nights no problem. Did not see any rats, cock roaches or crack heads. In fact there was a night security man that stayed in the car park all night. Coffe and cake was availiable in reception. There is a drinks machine, and somewhere to leave cases once checked out. If you require 5 star quality go elsewhere. The down side is the location. You7 need to get a 'L' numbered bus to South Beach from 79 street, or a 3, 16, or 93 bus to Bayside. All were fairly frequent. It is too far to walk. There is a large supermarket 5 min walk away. Also Wendys, Taco bell and various restaurants along Biscayne Ave. I found the red light restaurant next door a bit of a waste of time. They had run out of beer and various dishes when we went. The golden nugget was the Magnum piano bar, along 79 street, 3 minute walk, which served good valued drinks, and held a nice restaurant. Being hetrosexual was not a problem at the magnum which is a gay bar. Everyone is warmly welcomed. For the price we paid this was a good valued, honest motel, who appear to have been criticised in the past. I would go there again. The female receptionist when we checked in was helpful, and Amos was on the desk was excellent when checking out. In fact he found a airport shuttle for a good price.# Over all very good for the money. Richard M

Reviews.Title: “Run if you don't like rats!”
Reviews.Author: chompstar
Reviews.Content: Not knowing where to really stay in Miami, we booked this place because of it's reasonable prices. Boy, were we wrong! South Beach is the place to be if you want great beaches and beautiful restaurants. If you like dodgy areas and dirty rats then this is the place for you!

Reviews.Title: “Roaches all over the place !!!”
Reviews.Author: kubbe
Reviews.Content: we booked the motel for a 7 day stay. when we booked our trip we carefully took a look at the provided pictures. they seemed to look satisfiying especially when you consider the cheap rates. but as we now know dont trust any nice pictures - reality draws a different picture!!! when we returned from dinner at south beach on day 2 there were ROACHES ALL OVER THE PLACE in our room. when we switched on the light the hide under the bed and under the old and broken down furniture. we immediately packed our stuff and checked out at 1 am. however the staff at the front desk told us that it would only be possible to check out and get the money back for the remaining 4 days in the morning at 10:30 when the hotel manager would be available. but we had to pay the entire rate for the night we moved out at 1am. of course we moved to a different hotel that night- the holiday inn at port miami- which was really the higher rates worth it. we returned to hotel blu at 10:30 but the hotel manager wasn't available. after some more complaining the staff called the hotel manager and 30 minutes of waiting we talked to him. he was sorry and told us that 3 times a week a cleaning company would check the hotel rooms and search for bugs and roaches. incredible how this guy lied about the whole thing and took us for fools. besides that he promised us a dinner at a 4-star restaurant for the inconvenience we had due to the roaches. i gave him my number to call me because he wanted to talk to the chef of the restaurant and then call me back later. at 6 pm he still hadn't called and i called at the hotel but they told me he would call me as soon as he would have set up a time for dinner with the chef. until today i haven't received a call from him - what a surprise. so guys please choose other sleeping spots than this [-] place.

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel”
Reviews.Author: nana43315
Reviews.Content: We wanted to spend a day in Miami before our Cruise on sunday and had 2 rooms reserved. When we finally got to check in it was like walking into a nightmare. One room was so dirty that we had to request another one. Here are a few things we found. Mold all along the bottom of the shower curtian, Only one towel and wash cloth, A/C worked after being on for almost 2 hours, Lamps were broke, Frigs in room didn't work, Ice machine was broke, Furniture was nasty looking, Mirrors in room cracked. I treid to get my money back but they wanted to keep $120.00 of it so I told my Husband we would just go swimming (that was a joke). The pool had a bunch of drunken teenagers that were practially having sex in it. We went to dinner stayed out late came back in time to go straight to sleep and left first thing the next morning. This is the worst hotel I have ever been in. Please don't let the pictures on there web page fool you. Patty and Gary

Reviews.Title: “Get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: aussiestranger
Reviews.Content: I would like to say that I was not sure about this Motel but I had no complaints. I had no trouble checking in, the reception staff were very polite and helpful. The area is not the best to be walking around at during the night, but if you have a car as I did, you can go where you like. During the day I was out of my room and when I came back in the evening all was well and the room was tidy and linen and things had been changed. I had no trouble with any creepy crawlies either. Also there is Night Security at the Gate when you come in late at night as well. You get what you pay for at this motel and I got a good price, I thought, for a comfortable stay.

Reviews.Title: “In room 109 as I write”
Reviews.Author: RevRandy
